name: 方圓
objective:
以網際網路為本，介紹電腦網路基本概念與企業實務運作，奠定網路架構基礎，並說明資訊安全的重要性。

This course aims at teaching the basic, introductory networking topics as a firm foundation with the latest advances in wireless networking and providing the importance and ins and outs of information security as well.
schedule:
1 2/23 Introduction and Overview
2 3/2 Network Models 
3 3/9（錄影補課）
4 3/16 Physical Layer: Introduction to Physical Layer, Digital Transmission
5 3/23 Physical Layer: Digital Transmission, Analog Transmission 
6 3/30 Physical Layer: Bandwidth Utilization, Transmission Media
7 4/6 運動會補假 
8 4/13 Physical Layer: Switching, Introduction to Data-Link Layer
9 4/20 期中考試
10 4/27 Data-Link Layer: Wired LANs, Wireless LANs, Connecting Devices and Virtual LANs
11 5/4 Data-Link Layer: Error Detection and Correction, DLC, MAC
12 5/11 Network Layer: Network-Layer Protocols  
13 5/18 Network Layer: Unicast Routing, Multicast Routing, Next Generation IP
14 5/25 Transport Layer (I) 
15 6/1 Transport Layer (II), Application Layer (I)
16 6/8 Application Layer (II), Topics Related to All Layers, Security
17 6/15 專家演講
18 6/22 期末考試
scorePolicy:
平時：30%（3次作業，各10%）
期中考：30%
期末考：40%
額外加分：5%
materials:
Data Communications and Networking, 5E, Behrouz A. Forouzan, McGraw-Hill, 2013.（textbook）
Business Data Networks and Security, 10th Edition, Raymond R. Panko and Julia L. Panko, 2015, Pearson.
Computer Networking : A Top-Down Approach, 7/e Keith Ross (author), James Kurose (author)
